001import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
002import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
003import javax.swing.JPanel;
004import javax.swing.JDialog;
005import javax.swing.JLabel;
006import java.awt.Color;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.awt.BorderLayout;
009import javax.swing.JTextArea;
010import javax.swing.JScrollPane;
011
012/**
013 * Décrivez votre classe TradeButton ici.
014 *
015 * @author (votre nom)
016 * @version (un numéro de version ou une date)
017 */
018public class UseButton extends PopupButton implements ActionListener {
019    private UserInterface aUI;
020    private MC aMC;
021    
022    private JDialog aDialog;
023    private JPanel aMainPanel;
024    private JPanel aButtonPanel;
025    private JPanel aItemPanel;
026    private JPanel aItemLabelPanel;
027    private JPanel aItemCenterPanel;
028    private JPanel aSelectedPanel;
029    private JPanel aRoomCenterPanel;
030    
031    private JLabel aItemLabel;
032    private JLabel aSelected;
033    private JLabel aTarget;
034    
035    private Color aBGColor;
036    private Color aTextColor;
037    private Color aHoverBGColor;
038    private Color aHoverTextColor;
039    
040    private ArrayList<String> aItems;
041    
042    private ConfirmButton aConfirmButton;
043    private CancelButton aCancelButton;
044    public UseButton(final String pText, final UserInterface pUI) {
045        super(pText);
046        this.aUI = pUI;
047        this.aMC = this.aUI.getGE().getMC();
048        
049        this.aBGColor = new Color(56, 51, 51);
050        this.aTextColor = new Color(245, 240, 240);
051        this.aHoverBGColor = new Color(45, 40, 40);
052        this.aHoverTextColor = new Color(155, 150, 150);
053        
054        this.aItemLabel = new JLabel("Objets :");
055        this.aItemLabel.setForeground(Color.white);
056        this.aSelected = new JLabel("Selectionné : ");
057        this.aSelected.setForeground(Color.white);
058        this.aTarget = new JLabel("");
059        this.aTarget.setForeground(Color.white);
060        
061        this.aItems = new ArrayList<String>();
062        
063        this.addActionListener(this);
064    }
065    
066    @Override
067    public void actionPerformed(final ActionEvent pE) {
068        PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD = this.getText();
069        this.createDialog();
070    }
071    
072    private void createDialog() {
073        this.setPossibleItems();
074        
075        this.aDialog = new JDialog(this.aUI.getFrame(), JDialog.ModalityType.APPLICATION_MODAL);
076        this.aDialog.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
077        
078        this.aMainPanel = new JPanel();
079        this.aMainPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
080        this.aMainPanel.setBackground(new Color(20, 0, 0));
081        
082        // Panel des boutons confirmer et annuler
083        this.aButtonPanel = new JPanel();
084        this.aButtonPanel.setBackground(this.aBGColor);
085        
086        // panel avec les boutons des items
087        this.aItemPanel = new JPanel();
088        this.aItemPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
089        this.aItemPanel.setBackground(new Color(4, 51, 86));
090        
091        // panel pour le label Item
092        this.aItemLabelPanel = new JPanel();
093        this.aItemLabelPanel.add(this.aItemLabel);
094        this.aItemLabelPanel.setBackground(new Color(4, 51, 86));
095        
096        this.aItemPanel.add(this.aItemLabelPanel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
097    
098        this.aCancelButton = new CancelButton("Annuler", this.aDialog, this.aUI);
099        
100        this.aButtonPanel.add(this.aCancelButton);
101        
102        this.aMainPanel.add(this.aItemPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
103        this.aMainPanel.add(this.aButtonPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
104        
105        this.aItemCenterPanel = new JPanel();
106        
107        this.addButtons();
108        
109        this.aDialog.add(aMainPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
110        this.aDialog.setSize(500, 300);
111        this.aDialog.setUndecorated(true);
112        this.aDialog.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
113        
114        this.aDialog.setVisible(true);
115    }
116    
117    private void setPossibleItems() {
118        this.aItems.clear();
119        if(!this.aMC.getItemList().empty()) {
120            for(String vItemName : this.aMC.getItemList().getItems().keySet()) {
121                if(!this.aItems.contains(vItemName))
122                    this.aItems.add(vItemName);
123            }
124        }
125    }
126    
127    private void addButtons() {
128        for(String vItemName : this.aItems) {
129            this.aItemCenterPanel.add(new TargetButton(vItemName, this.aUI, this.aDialog));
130        }
131        this.aItemPanel.add(this.aItemCenterPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
132    }
133    
134    public static void readLetter(final GameEngine pGE, final Letter pLetter) {
135        JDialog vDialog = new JDialog(pGE.getUI().getFrame(), JDialog.ModalityType.APPLICATION_MODAL);
136        vDialog.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
137        
138        JPanel vMainPanel = new JPanel();
139        vMainPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
140        vMainPanel.setBackground(new Color(20, 0, 0));
141        
142        // Panel des boutons confirmer et annuler
143        JPanel vButtonPanel = new JPanel();
144        vButtonPanel.setBackground(new Color(56, 51, 51));
145    
146        CancelButton vCancelButton = new CancelButton("Annuler", vDialog, pGE.getUI());
147        
148        vButtonPanel.add(vCancelButton);
149        
150        JTextArea vTextArea = new JTextArea();
151        JScrollPane vContent = new JScrollPane(vTextArea);
152        vTextArea.setText(pLetter.getContent());
153        
154        vMainPanel.add(vContent, BorderLayout.CENTER);
155        vMainPanel.add(vButtonPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
156        
157        
158        vDialog.add(vMainPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
159        vDialog.setSize(500, 300);
160        vDialog.setUndecorated(true);
161        vDialog.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
162        
163        vDialog.setVisible(true);
164    }
165}
